query:
SELECT
                st.trip_id,
                st.stop_id,
                st.arrival,
                st.departure,
                t.route_id,
                CASE
                    WHEN t.assigned IS NOT NULL THEN 'train'
                    ELSE 'bus'
                END AS "trip_type!"
            FROM
                stop_time st
            LEFT JOIN trip t ON
                st.trip_id = t.id
            WHERE
                st.arrival BETWEEN $1 AND ($1 + INTERVAL '4 hours')
            ORDER BY
                st.arrival
